body.name: Beautiful Nomad Women's Linen High Waisted Straight Pants Casual Flowy Wide Leg Drawstring Trousers with Pockets
features: 【MATERIAL】Soft, breathable, colorfast linen fabric, lightweight, wear-resistant, comfortable to wear and skin-friendly, loose-fitting, allowing you to stay fresh in the hot weather.

【DESIGN】Women's pants with drawstring . High waist design,drawstring adjustable waistband,make you wear more fit. Wide leg design drapes beautifully from hip to leg, shaping your legs and making you look slim and elegant. Two side pockets add functionality to these stylish pants.
【MATCH】These must-have wide-leg pants are easy to pair with basic t-shirts, tank tops, blouses, sandals, and heels for a casual look.

【OCCASION】Women's casual flowy pants for daily wear, vacation, summer beach, yoga, work, shopping, wherever you go, you will look stylish in these beautiful pants. Suitable for any other casual occasions in spring, summer and fall.

【ATTENTION】Please refer to the size chart in the picture before ordering. Hand wash/machine wash, sorted wash, hang or hang dry, do not bleach. If you have any questions about Cotton Linen Casual Pants, please write to us, we are here to help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE Mocha Brown; beautiful warm copper/bronzish/rust brick tone (Got size Medium)
reviews.reviewText: I jump at anything with natural (cotton/ linen) materials, & a linen with additional non-linen just says to me it may be less-likely to wear as wrinkly- I will update on that after a wash but just wanted to note the gorgeous (better than photos) color! (& pleasing fit!) Both color & style /material reminds me exactly of pants I had in the 00s :) (Except those didn't have elastic.. I'm not one to typically show off elastic but I got these anyway for longer tops & lounging, for which they're perfect)These definitely look and feel like linen, with the weave and those subtle nubs and wavy/wrinklesHas both elastic, and a fully functional (all way round) drawstring.I'm typically a size small in pants, sometimes xs (varies) 2,4,6, the smallest size available when I grabbed these was Medium. They are super comfortable and look great in the legs, and perfect for wearing as intended (PJ lounge comfy pants, with longer loose baggy top/sweater if I were to wear them *out*Pulled up to my waist they weren't low-crotched or that saggy/baggy, really, as they drape just straight down pretty nicely~ just a bit of extra room in the hip. It's the perfect wide-leg "straight through hip and thigh" cut/ look~ I'd buy these again and try (my size) small next time and I'll let you know if the legs on those are not quite as wide as these Medium ones (as I imagine would be the case... so if you're looking for a pretty wide leg, I'd say don't be afraid to give the next size up a try because you might like the drape in the upper portion/ hip area)The elastic is stretchy enough to not be too tight or uncomfortable. It's great for my waist, I don't *need* to use the drawstring, nor are they snug enough for me to be too aware of it/ uncomfortable.I'm 5'4 1/2 and they are the perfect length to me- long enough where they weren't feeling like they're going to shrink up to my ankles/top of my feet, but I wasn't tripping over them either. They just perfectly graze down to the base of my tennis shoes/ just about touching the floor. Perfect for sandals Or something with a bit of a heel.Easy breezy pant, great find, nice classic style in a beautiful/ refreshing terracotta color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fabric and the construction of these slacks is really nice. They are slightly more snug than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great material but too large on me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I would size down. I went by the size chart and sized up. I should have went by true to size or maybe even sized down. I'll wear them to lounge in but they are too big to wear out. But overall great quality and comfy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and flowy
reviews.reviewText: These pants were what I was looking for. High waisted and comfortable to wear. Flowy. Made of good material and seems quality. I definitely recommend getting a pair of these. They are true to size and great to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I'd be more than happy if I could just wear pajama pants all the time, so I look for work pants that feel similarly. These are a real find on that front! They're soft and breezy, elastic so they aren't anything you have to corset yourself into, and still look professional and go with just about anything. I feel like they're a good quality and as someone who is 5'7'', I'm really quite happy with how this fit fell on me. A very welcome addition to my wardrobe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits and looks great, awesome for work!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE THEM. So glad they had a small enough size to fit my petite frame. I like the fit on the waist, and the quality is great. Can be dressed up or down with sneakers. I will be getting the black, but I wish they had more colors/patterns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High Waisted Linen Pants
reviews.reviewText: Very Comfortable and nice-looking pants. They are great pants to hang out at home. Machine Washable. I do not put them in the dryer as linen tends to shrink a bit and since I bought a size M, which fits, I cannot have them shrink an inch. The pants look nice when on but for me, a bit long (I am 5'4" and need to wear heals or hem them shorter)
